markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Ectoplasmic Interstice](/Spells.aspx?ID=617)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=51)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 15-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the ectoplasmic interstice, [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures cannot pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of –5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the interstice overcome resistances as if they were by [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) weapons.
name: Ectoplasmic Interstice

summary_markdown: You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures.
text: Ectoplasmic Interstice Source Gods & Magic pg. 117 2.0 Domain Soul Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Area 15-foot emanation Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the ectoplasmic interstice, incorporeal creatures cannot pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of –5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its Athletics modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the interstice overcome resistances as if they were by ghost touch weapons.
